column4: Can anyone tell me that if I install something on my Dapper box and if the file contains the binary in /usr/bin and i want it to be displayed under applications how do i do it??
You can right click on the applications menu and add a new item.  The executable will be /usr/bin/nameofexecutable and you can put your own icon for it in /usr/share/icons
and shatrat: Thanks let me try it out
